entry.tran: (对热、电等)具有传导性的;导电(或热)的
entry.def: A conductive substance is able to conduct things such as heat and electricity.

example.ex: Salt water is much more conductive than fresh water is.
example.tran: 盐水比淡水的传导性强得多。

means.word_mean: 1. having the quality or power of conducting heat or electricity or sound; exhibiting conductivity
